segment.source: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V
segment.target: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V

segment.source: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V
segment.target: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V

segment.source: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V
segment.target: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V

segment.source: Before you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Server, you must create the following objects in Active Directory.
segment.target: Before you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Server, you must create the following objects in Active Directory.

segment.source: App-V uses Active Directory groups to control access to applications and administrative functions.
segment.target: App-V uses Active Directory groups to control access to applications and administrative functions.

segment.source: You will use these groups during the server installation process and when publishing applications.
segment.target: You will use these groups during the server installation process and when publishing applications.

segment.source: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for Application Virtualization
segment.target: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for Application Virtualization

segment.source: This table lists the Active Directory groups that are required for installing App-V.
segment.target: This table lists the Active Directory groups that are required for installing App-V.

segment.source: Object
segment.target: Object

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Organizational Unit (OU)
segment.target: Organizational Unit (OU)

segment.source: Create an OU in Active Directory for the specific groups required for App-V.
segment.target: Create an OU in Active Directory for the specific groups required for App-V.

segment.source: App-V Administrative Group
segment.target: App-V Administrative Group

segment.source: During installation of the App-V Management Server, you must select an Active Directory group to use as the App-V Administrators group to control administrative access to the Management Console.
segment.target: During installation of the App-V Management Server, you must select an Active Directory group to use as the App-V Administrators group to control administrative access to the Management Console.

segment.source: Create a security group for App-V administrators, and add to this group every user who needs to use the Management Console.
segment.target: Create a security group for App-V administrators, and add to this group every user who needs to use the Management Console.

segment.source: You cannot create this group directly from the App-V Management Server installer.
segment.target: You cannot create this group directly from the App-V Management Server installer.

segment.source: App-V Users Group
segment.target: App-V Users Group

segment.source: App-V requires that every User account that accesses App-V functions be a member of a provider policy associated with a single group for general platform access.
segment.target: App-V requires that every User account that accesses App-V functions be a member of a provider policy associated with a single group for general platform access.

segment.source: Use an existing group; for example, Domain Users, if all users are to have access to App-V, or create a new group.
segment.target: Use an existing group; for example, Domain Users, if all users are to have access to App-V, or create a new group.

segment.source: Application Groups
segment.target: Application Groups

segment.source: App-V associates the right to use an individual application with an Active Directory group.
segment.target: App-V associates the right to use an individual application with an Active Directory group.

segment.source: Create an Active Directory group for each application, and assign users to these groups as needed to control user access to the applications.
segment.target: Create an Active Directory group for each application, and assign users to these groups as needed to control user access to the applications.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment Requirements
